basic.description: Overview of techniques for the performance evaluation of computer systems and networks. Discrete event digital simulation of stochastic processes. Simulation methodology. Design of simulation experiments. Analysis and validation of simulation models and results. Operational analysis.
basic.subject: ELEC
basic.title: Modelling & Systems Simulation

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite of ELEC326 or STAT351 and registered in a BSCE Academic Program or an SODE-P-BCH Academic Plan.
